profile.title: Profile
profile.description1: I am an engineer specialized in blockchain technology, particularly Solana-related development. I also work as a community manager, aiming to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical people.
profile.description2: I am passionate about learning and implementing new technologies, and actively contribute to open source projects.

wallet.title: Blockchain Wallet
wallet.description: A web wallet application for the Solana blockchain. Implemented token management, NFT display, and transaction history viewing features.

marketplace.title: NFT Marketplace
marketplace.description: A marketplace for buying and selling digital art NFTs. Implemented auction functionality and automatic creator royalty distribution.

dashboard.title: DeFi Dashboard
dashboard.description: A dashboard for managing and visualizing assets across multiple DeFi protocols. Implemented real-time performance analysis functionality.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For project inquiries, speaking engagements, or any other questions, please use the form below. I will respond within 48 hours.
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. I will get back to you soon.
